0.1.name: wordpress/wp-e-commerce-dashboard-widgets
0.1.description:
A selection of admin dashboard widgets showing key information about your WP e-Commerce store, including sales graphs, revenue graphs and other useful information. Makes available the following widgets in the WP dashboard: * Recent Orders * Orders to ship * Recent product ratings * Sales graph * Revenue Graph

Also features a fully customisable CSV download for orders, and order lines.

NOTE: THIS IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH WP E-COMMERCE 3.8 - FOR MORE INFORMATION SEE HERE

WP e-Commerce Dashboard
